mapper.insert: insert into movie ( movie_no, movie_title, movie_intro, movie_actors, movie_genre, movie_playTime, movie_limit, movie_date, image_uuid ) values ( movie_seq.nextval, #{movieTitle}, #{movieIntro}, #{movieActors}, #{movieGenre}, #{moviePlayTime}, #{movieLimit}, #{movieDate}, #{imageUuid} )
mapper.select: SELECT movie_no, movie_title, movie_intro, movie_actors, movie_genre, movie_PlayTime, movie_limit, to_char(movie_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as movie_date, image_uuid FROM movie WHERE movie_no = #{movieNo}
mapper.update: update movie set movie_title = #{movieTitle}, movie_intro = #{movieIntro}, movie_actors = #{movieActors}, movie_genre = #{movieGenre}, movie_playTime = #{moviePlayTime}, movie_limit = #{movieLimit}, image_uuid = #{imageUuid} where movie_no = #{movieNo}
